summary: This document is a summary of account activity for a Deutsche Bank account from June 1, 2018, to June 30, 2018. It details the account balance, transactions, service charges, and interest earned during the period. The document is marked confidential and is part of the Epstein case documentation.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is mentioned as an attorney associated with the account in question.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is listed as a personal assistant for inquiries related to the account.

keyFacts: The document summarizes account activity for a Deutsche Bank account for June 2018.
The beginning balance on June 1, 2018, was $267,972.25.
The ending balance on June 30, 2018, was $268,145.51.
Interest earned during this period was $173.26.
Darren K. Indyke is identified as the attorney associated with the account.
